paths: Obvious exits: northeast, southeast, southwest, up
description: Wedged between a small copper-sided chest and a water-filled oak barrel, a rough painted oak sign provides information for the game that can played in the torch-lit cavern.  Various water cannons, some broken and others displaying signs of recent repair, are scattered about the uneven floor, though a few in working condition rest against a deep sand-filled crag and appear ready for use.  Splitting her attention between cannon and patrons, a mop-haired freckled girl collects coins and tinkers with jovial abandon.
title: [Caligos Isle, Water Cannons]
